com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.util

Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.util.Header
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Header
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    This class represents the format of the header of the messages exchanged by applications using the library.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Header

        public Header()
        Default constructor

      • Header

        public Header(int type,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String name)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - an integer value which represents the type of the message.
        label - a String value which represents the label used to identify device.
        name - a String value which represents the device name.

      • Header

        public Header(int type,
              java.lang.String mac,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String name)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - an integer value which represents the type of the message.
        mac - a String value which represents the device MAC address.
        label - a String value which represents the label used to identify device.
        name - a String value which represents the device name.

      • Header

        public Header(int type,
              java.lang.String address,
              java.lang.String mac,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String name)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - an integer value which represents the type of the message.
        address - a String value which represents the device logical address (UUID for Bluetooth and IP for Wi-Fi).
        mac - a String value which represents the device MAC address.
        label - a String value which represents the label used to identify device.
        name - a String value which represents the device name.

      • Header

        public Header(int type,
              java.lang.String mac,
              java.lang.String label,
              java.lang.String name,
              int deviceType)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - an integer value which represents the type of the message.
        mac - a String value which represents the device MAC address.
        label - a String value which represents the label used to identify device.
        name - a String value which represents the device name.
        deviceType - an integer which represents the type of the device (Bluetooth or Wi-Fi)
